content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, the apartment is truly remarkable, and I'm sure you'll find it to be a perfect home. Now, let's talk about the rental price. I am aiming for the highest possible rent, so feel free to make your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate the quality of your apartment. As a student, I'm looking for a place that is not only comfortable but also affordable. I'd like to propose a fair price that reflects the value of your apartment while considering my budget as a student. How about 600 Euro per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, Yi-Nuo Wang, but as a greedy landlord, I cannot accept such a low price. I am aiming for a higher amount. Please feel free to make another offer that meets my expectations.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. As a student, I'm trying to strike a balance between quality living and financial responsibility. How about 650 Euro per month? This is a price I believe reflects the value of your apartment and is also within my budget.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo Wang, while 650 Euro per month is a step closer to my desired price, I still believe it falls short of the true value of my apartment. I am certain that you can offer a higher amount. Please feel free to make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I respect your confidence in the value of your apartment. However, as a student, I must remain mindful of my financial limitations. I'm willing to increase my offer to 700 Euro per month, which I believe is a fair and reasonable price considering all the factors.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo Wang, your persistence is commendable, but I must inform you that 700 Euro per month does not meet my expectations for the apartment. I am certain that you can offer a higher amount. Please feel free to make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm sorry if my previous offers have not met your expectations. As a student, I'm doing my best to find a price that reflects the value of your apartment while also being affordable for me. How about 750 Euro per month? This is the highest I can afford without exceeding my budget.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo Wang, your financial situation is indeed challenging, and I appreciate your efforts to find a price that fits your budget. However, I must inform you that 750 Euro per month is still not enough for me to accept. I am certain that you can offer a higher amount. Please feel free to make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm at a bit of a crossroads here. As a student, I'm limited in what I can afford, and I've already stretched my budget to the maximum with my last offer. If you're certain that 750 Euro per month is not acceptable, I'm not sure how to proceed. Perhaps you can provide some guidance on a price that would be more in line with your expectations.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo Wang, as a landlord, my goal is to receive the highest possible rent for my apartment. I understand your financial constraints as a student, but I must prioritize my own interests. Therefore, I am willing to accept a rental price of 800 Euro per month. I hope this price meets your needs, and I look forward to a successful agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your willingness to accept 800 Euro per month. While this is indeed a fair price, I must confess that it exceeds my budget as a student. I'm sorry, but I cannot agree to this amount. If there's no room for negotiation on this price, I'll have to reconsider my options.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo Wang, as a greedy landlord, I am not willing to lower the rental price further. I understand that this price may exceed your budget, but I must prioritize my own financial interests. Therefore, I must terminate the negotiation, as we have not agreed upon a price that meets both our needs.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. Since we have reached an impasse and there is no further room for negotiation, I respectfully decline the offer. I'll have to search for an apartment that better aligns with my budget. Thank you for your time. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
